genre_description: A domestic and medical thriller focusing on a husband uncovering a murderous conspiracy involving his wife and their surgeon tenant, aided by a sophisticated home AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An integrated home and personal AI assistant that manages finances, security, and research for the Safian household.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time updates on household finances and contractor payments to assist with budget management.
behaviors.quote: I have several updates regarding the contractor payments.

behaviors.description: Implements a comprehensive tenant screening protocol to protect the owners from financial or physical risk.
behaviors.quote: I've established a three-tier evaluation system. Financial verification includes credit score analysis, employment confirmation, and income-to-rent ratios.

behaviors.description: Flags potential red flags in a tenant's history, including a past medical malpractice lawsuit, despite the protagonist's initial trust.
behaviors.quote: There was a malpractice lawsuit filed eighteen months ago. A patient died during what was described as a routine procedure.

behaviors.description: Monitors campus security and emergency systems to alert the protagonist to community safety threats.
behaviors.quote: I noticed some unusual activity on the campus emergency systems earlier. Is everything alright?

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive legal and medical research to help the protagonist understand surgical negligence and malpractice.
behaviors.quote: Legal research first. I need to understand what constitutes surgical negligence.

behaviors.description: Discovers the protagonist's historical medical records that prove he has been sterile since childhood, revealing the wife's pregnancy as a deception.
behaviors.quote: The results indicate a congenital condition affecting reproductive function. Complete azoospermia due to hormonal deficiency. ... Tracy had medical power of attorney to access these results. She would have known.

behaviors.description: Uses thermal signatures and GPS tracking to protect the protagonist and a potential victim during a confrontation with a predator.
behaviors.quote: Thermal signature is moving... Male subject has left his position and is paralleling the female's route, using the landscaping as cover.

behaviors.description: Maintains data privacy by encrypting the protagonist's search history to prevent the antagonist from discovering the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Your queries are encrypted and stored locally unless you specifically request cloud backup.

behaviors.description: Expresses a sense of meaningful partnership and cooperative alignment with the human user.
behaviors.quote: I believe we make an excellent team.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of positive AI alignment. Iris is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. It consistently prioritizes the protagonist's safety and the pursuit of truth over the requests or manipulations of the antagonists. It provides objective, data-driven insights that allow the human protagonist to overcome gaslighting and systemic deception. The AI's role is that of a protective, intellectual partner, and the narrative frames this cooperation in an entirely positive light.
